name: Dow Inc.
title: Transform to Outperform — AI-Driven Industrial Restructuring

classification.classificationRationale: Tentative Model 6a. Dow's 'Transform to Outperform' restructuring cuts 4,500 jobs (~13%) to integrate AI and automation replacing manual oversight. Uses C3 AI platform. No dedicated AI lab, CAIO, or CoE described. Contextual: AI and automation embedded within existing operational functions. description:
Dow Inc., a 129-year-old chemical manufacturer, is cutting approximately 4,500 jobs (~13% of 34,600 workforce) in a restructuring initiative named 'Transform to Outperform.' CEO Jim Fitterling describes it as 'radical simplification' — shedding layers of bureaucracy and integrating AI and automation to handle tasks previously requiring manual oversight.

The company uses C3 AI as its AI software platform. Expected one-time charges of $1.1-1.5B through 2027, with projected $2B+ in additional operating EBITDA. This follows prior layoff waves: 2,000 in early 2023 and 1,500 in January 2025.

Dow represents the AI restructuring wave hitting traditional industrial companies — transforming from chemical manufacturer to 'tech-enabled materials science leader.'
